snippet: The authorities say a package addressed to Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County would have exploded if opened, leading to serious injuries or death.
abstract: Arizona authorities say package addressed to Maricopa County Sheriff Joe Arpaio would have exploded if opened, leading to serious injuries or death.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say a package addressed to Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County would have exploded if opened, leading to serious injuries or death.

headline.main: Arizona: Explosives Sent to Maricopa Sheriff
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Explosives Sent To Maricopa Sheriff
